title: [Large-Scale] Intermediate Procedural Scaffolding-Based Course for Improving Online English Writing Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of English grammar and basic writing structures
context.additional_context: Conducts simulation/VR-based education accessible in smartphone environments for advanced graduate-level learners, emphasizing formative assessment to enhance self-directed writing skills

learning_goals: Learners can design academic English essay structures using a three-stage procedural checklist.
Learners can correct grammatical errors with over 80% accuracy through real-time feedback in VR-based environments.
Learners can submit self-assessment reports utilizing metacognition at least four times in weekly formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
